logs.message: logging.debug(f"Initializing Student: name={name}, age={age}, grade={grade}, subject={subject}")
logging.debug(f"Entering update_grade with grade={grade} for student {self}")
logging.debug(f"Entering get_student_info for Student id={self.id}")
logging.info(f'Retrieved student info: name={self.name}, age={self.age}, grade={self.grade}, subject={self.subject}')
logging.debug(f"Initializing School with name: {name}")
logging.debug(f"Entering add_student with student: {student}")
logging.debug(f"Entered remove_student with name={name}")
logging.info(f'Student {name} successfully removed from the school.')
logging.info(f"Failed to remove student '{name}': student not found.")
logging.debug('Entered get_school_info method of School class')
logging.info(f'Returning school info for school: {self.name} with {len(self.students)} students')
logging.debug(f"Entering read_json with file_path={file_path}")
logging.info(f'Successfully read JSON file from {file_path}')
logging.error(f'Failed to read JSON file at {file_path}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Entering write_json with file_path={file_path} and data of length={len(data)}")
logging.error(f'Failed to write JSON data to {file_path}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Entering fetch_data with url: {url}")
logging.error(f'Failed to fetch data from {url} with response: {response}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Entering load_schools with file_path={file_path}")
logging.info(f'Returning {len(schools)} schools loaded from {file_path}')
logging.debug(f"Entered save_schools with file_path={file_path} and {len(schools)} schools")
logging.debug(f"Entering create_student with name={name}, age={age}, grade={grade}, subject={subject}")
logging.info(f'Creating Student with name={name}, age={age}, grade={grade}, subject={subject}')
logging.debug(f"Entered fetch_external_data with url: {url}")
logging.debug('Entered main function')
